327,79|312,80|294,89|274,109|254,108|215,108|172,123|42,133|34,187|49,191|54,189|134,189|154,190|254,190|274,191|374,191|394,192|494,192|514,193|614,193|634,194|734,194|754,195|854,195|874,196|974,196|994,197|1094,197|1114,198|1214,198|1234,199|1334,199|1354,200|1454,200|1474,201|1554,201|1574,202|1634,202|1654,193|1674,189|1694,189|1714,197|1734,197|1754,199|1794,199|1814,201|1834,205|1841,206|1889,207|1894,207|1896,207|1918,208|1926,205|1920,144|1708,135|1573,144|1545,114|1323,117|1248,113|1154,113|1134,112|1074,112|1065,103|1041,102|1023,103|1014,112|934,112|914,111|778,111|661,115|387,111|383,109|374,109|354,129|336,84|327,79 308-01|308|.|Letters|Orders|and|Instructions|December|1755|.
